name: Candle and Jack
description:
Controls:

[W,A,S,D] or Arrow Keys - Movement

[Q] - Stop/Stop Candle (ability has a short cooldown)

[E] - Turn off lights (ability has a short cooldown)

You are Jack. Your little brother Candle is terrified of light, and it is up to you to keep him safe from streetlights and roaming trick or treaters.

If you enjoyed this game please consider donating to the Central Texas Food Bank (link opens in new tab).

Credits:

Alex Rodriguez - Level Designer
Coby West - Jack of All Trades
Jessie Downs - Artist/Animator
Josh Potts - Programmer
Justin R - Programmer
Mara Howard - Artist
Mathew Dwyer - Composer

This game was created for the Shock and Awwww Game Jam
